Class com.tektools.kawa.plugin.KawaApp 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----com.tektools.kawa.plugin.KawaObject
           |
           +----com.tektools.kawa.plugin.KawaApp
public class KawaApp
extends KawaObject
Represents the Kawa application to the java program. KawaApp contains only static members. No instance of a KawaApp object can be created.

build
Kawa build window object
out
Kawa output window object
SCMSTATUS_CHECKEDIN
Source control status checked in.
SCMSTATUS_CHECKEDOUT
Source control status checked out.
SCMSTATUS_NONE
Source control status none or reset
SCMSTATUS_UNKNOWN
Source control status unknown

KawaApp()
Constructor.

addListener(KawaEventListener)
Add a KawaEventListener to the list of current listeners.
dispatchEvent(KawaEvent)
Dispatches an event to the registered listeners in KawaApp.
enumerateEditors()
Returns an enumeration of the editors in the program.
enumerateProjects()
Returns an enumeration of the projects in the project tree.
getConfigDirectory()
Returns the value of Kawa configuration directory from Customize/Options dialog.
getCurrentProject()
Returns a KawaProject object of the currently open project.
getListenersCount()
Return the number of current listeners on KawaApp.
openProject(String, boolean)
Opens the project of a given path.
removeListener(KawaEventListener)
Remove a KawaEventListener from the list of listeners.

SCMSTATUS_UNKNOWN 
 public static final int SCMSTATUS_UNKNOWN
Source control status unknown

SCMSTATUS_NONE 
 public static final int SCMSTATUS_NONE
Source control status none or reset

SCMSTATUS_CHECKEDIN 
 public static final int SCMSTATUS_CHECKEDIN
Source control status checked in. This will set the icon in the project tree to checked in icon. The icon is stored as an .ico file under /icon folder in the Kawa directory for customization.

SCMSTATUS_CHECKEDOUT 
 public static final int SCMSTATUS_CHECKEDOUT
Source control status checked out. This will set the icon in the project tree to checked in icon. The icon is stored as an .ico file under /icon folder in the Kawa directory for customization.

out 
 public static KawaOutputWindow out
Kawa output window object

See Also:
KawaOutputWindow

 public static KawaBuildWindow build
Kawa build window object

See Also:
KawaBuildWindow

KawaApp 
 protected KawaApp()
Constructor. This object cannot be instantiated except by Kawa.

enumerateEditors 
 public static native Enumeration enumerateEditors()
Returns an enumeration of the editors in the program.

Returns:
Enumeration Enumeration of all the editors
See Also:
KawaEditor
enumerateProjects 
 public static native Enumeration enumerateProjects()
Returns an enumeration of the projects in the project tree.

Returns:
Enumeration Enumeration of all the projects
See Also:
KawaProject
getCurrentProject 
 public static native KawaProject getCurrentProject()
Returns a KawaProject object of the currently open project.

See Also:
KawaProject
getConfigDirectory 
 public static native String getConfigDirectory()
Returns the value of Kawa configuration directory from Customize/Options dialog. On a single user system this is the directory where Kawa is installed.

Returns:
Kawa configuration directory.
openProject 
 public static native KawaProject openProject(String projectName,
                                              boolean create)
Opens the project of a given path. Optionally creates a new one if not found.

Parameters:
projectName - Project file path
create - true to create a new project if not found.
Returns:
kawa Project
See Also:
KawaProject
dispatchEvent 
 public static boolean dispatchEvent(KawaEvent event)
Dispatches an event to the registered listeners in KawaApp. This method is called by Kawa for distributing events to all listeners.

Parameters:
event - KawaEvent object.
Returns:
true or false
See Also:
KawaEvent
addListener 
 public static void addListener(KawaEventListener newListener)
Add a KawaEventListener to the list of current listeners. In order to receive KawaApp event add your listener thru this method.

Parameters:
newListener - Listener object
removeListener 
 public static void removeListener(KawaEventListener newListener)
Remove a KawaEventListener from the list of listeners. Remove any registered listener for not receiving any more KawaApp events.

Parameters:
newListener - Listener object to remove
See Also:
KawaEventListener
getListenersCount 
 public static int getListenersCount()
Return the number of current listeners on KawaApp.

Returns:
int Count of registered listeners
